mobs.LongDesc: A man dressed in robes stand here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a man dressed in simple robes walking around minding his own business
He wonders if he will become a Grand Librarian like his father.

mobs.LongDesc: A Priest goes silently about his work.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a priest standing here studying a scroll. He appears not to notice you
as he strolls on his way.

mobs.LongDesc: The Apothecary stands patiently staring at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see an Apothecary standing here looking for people to heal. He has a
medical box in one hand and a huge gun holstered at his hip. You can only
guess what the gun is used for.

mobs.LongDesc: A man in light scout armor glares at you nervously.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man wears a light type of the armor you've seen in some of the cases
around this Cathedral. He walks around looking for evil to destroy.

mobs.LongDesc: A man in robotic metal armor glares at you through his gun sight.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man is dressed in normal, tactical, body armor of his chapter. He looks as
if he has seen many battles and will see many more. He glares at you, but
keeps walking by.

mobs.LongDesc: A man encased in robotic metal armor makes his way towards you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man is dressed in the chapters finest armor, terminator armor. He wanders
around the complex looking for evil to snuff out. He looks as if he'd do a
good job at it also.

mobs.LongDesc: A techmarine walks past you going about his bussiness.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The chapters life-blood, the techmarine. Without him the chapter would never be
able to fix the complicated technology they use to destroy evil. He carries a
wrench and a gun with him as he smiles at you.

mobs.LongDesc: A Tactical Space Marine carries on a conversation over his com.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man is dressed in tactical body armor. He stalks the complex for evil,
which he will then destroy. He carries a gun which looks like it could blow a
hole in anything.

mobs.LongDesc: A cook is busy making dinner for the troops.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a non-descript cook here cleaning up and making some kind of gruel for
the troops. He waves his hand at you saying that you'll have to wait your
turn.

mobs.LongDesc: A man hurries around assisting the cook.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man seems to never stop moving, he's either getting things for the cook or
doing his own feeble cooking. He glares at you and tells you to step aside

mobs.LongDesc: A man walks around, laboring and toiling for his master.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A serf, what else can I say? He wears cheap clothes and smells of sweat. He
asks politely if you could help him with some of his many chores.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge, mechanical robot stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This robot is the chapter's pride and joy. It is huge, standing eleven feet
tall and has as many weapons as a squad of troops does. It's chest is covered
with the emblem of the chapter and it has company markings on either arm.
There's no mixing this up with another chapter's dreadnought.

mobs.LongDesc: The Bandar Squad Leader beckons for the rest of his troops to follow.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Bandar is a sort of hero in his own mind. He sees his life as one major victory
after another. Even if he does lose a fight, he still wins when the space
ships orbitting over head start their atomic bombardment.

mobs.LongDesc: The quartermaster is keep logs of troop supplies.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Thad is losing most of his hair having to deal with the logistics of the
chapter. Do you have any idea how much toliet paper the chapter uses in a
month? He does and he also knows how much underware the chapter needs washed
each day. What a job!

mobs.LongDesc: The Imperial Psychic reads your mind.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This tall slender man is the chapter's psychic. He deals with the trouble of
traveling in the warp and handle any warp storms when they occur. His head,
not to be rude, is the size of a watermelon! He wears a robe and carries a
side-arm at his side, of course.

mobs.LongDesc: A man in dark robes stands here chanting something.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Grand Librarian, the high magus of the chapter stands here with all his
glory. He seems to be full of energy as he looks at you. His eyes peering deep
into your soul. You feel a bit queasy after the whole experience.

mobs.LongDesc: A man in metal armor engraved with runes stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This magus is the second in comand for the chapter, if the Grand Librarian ever
falls in battle it is the Codicier's job to take his place. He wears body
armor just like his troops.

mobs.LongDesc: You see old Cassius standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Cassius is the oldest member of the chapter, over 600 years old to be exact. He
loves to tell stories about the days of old and starts into one right now. We
I was a young pup, like yourself, we didn't have automatic flushing toliets we
had to jiggle the handle and wait for it to....RUN!!!! Before you are bored to
death!

mobs.LongDesc: Crazy Olof the Techmarine stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Olof is completely mad! He is wearing no armor and has only a wrench to fend
off attackers. He has a bald head and his teeth are all missing except one. He
can be heard muttering to himself about fixing up his bike for the next
battle, or making new types of wierd weapons, that would do more harm to the
user than to anyone else. What no one knows is that Olof is not the original
Olof, but a clone, actually he is the 137 clone of Olof. After all those
clones you would be crazy too!

mobs.LongDesc: Thandor the Ultramarine's Captian is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Thandor is the chapter's captain, which he does a very good job at. He leads
his men into battle and is the first to lead his men out of battle, if it is
very quickly or not. He stares at you asking himself why you are here.

mobs.LongDesc: Dandor the Ultramarine's Instructor stands here bellowing out orders.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dandor, Thandor's brother, used to be captian, but he was caught in th leg with
a lascannon blast that left him somewhat handicapped. He now teachs young
recruits how to more effectively dodge those nasty lascannon blasts.

mobs.LongDesc: A Space Marine Robot stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A robot stands here waiting for orders. He is rusty and seems to be missing
some armor, but that doesn't bother it, just as long as it gets it's weekly
oil treatment.

mobs.LongDesc: A robed man stands here studying from a book.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a tall robed figure standing before you. He is concentrating
on studying what ever is written in the book before him.  When he
sees you he says "Hey! Get outta here!"

mobs.LongDesc: The Chaplain is here praying.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
As you enter the room you notice this man praying infront of an alter. He wears
Terminator armour. His armour is the heaviest in the Imperium. It is made of
about three inches of ceremite and has a nuclear power plant running it.

mobs.LongDesc: An evil Cultist stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Foam drips from this crazed man's mouth as he looks around blindly. He is
dressed in robes that are stained with blood and gore.

mobs.LongDesc: You see an evilt Cultist trooper standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man is dressed in robes and has a deadly look on his face. He looks to be
a natural leader and a aura of command hangs about him.

mobs.LongDesc: A chaos dog stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Calling this thing a dog, would be an insult to the dog. It has huge teeth
stained yellow and large limbs. It stands about 5 feet tall at the shoulder
and stinks badly.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a cultist leader standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Leader of the Cultists this man wears a simple dress uniform. The uniform has
lots of shiny medals on it and looks to be important. He walks with the
dignity of a general.

mobs.LongDesc: A beastman stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This thing looks to be a cross between a ram and a human. It has a vagely human
shape to it, but it's head is one of a ram. It walks with a limp and has no
verbal skills.

mobs.LongDesc: A chaos fleshhound stands here glaring.
A Chaos Marine Scout stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Standing before you is a man clad in light scout armor of the Imperial Space
Marines. The armor is dented up and looks to be decaying. His face is covered
up by a small helmet, with it's blast shield down.

mobs.LongDesc: A Chaos Wizard stands here muttering to himself.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A man stands here in long decaying robes. He has a hood covering his face, but
you can see two small glowing eyes in the darkness of the hood. A stench hangs
around him and he sways as he moves.

mobs.LongDesc: A Tactical Chaos Marine stands here aiming his gun at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A man stands here clad in some kind of metal armor. It has dents and holes all
over it, as well as burn marks from laser fire.

mobs.LongDesc: A member of the Death Guard stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man looks more of a monster than a man. His suit looks as if it is grafted
to his body and in places it is. His helmet is only a face mask and a tube
attached to his mouth. His eyes are completely white.

mobs.LongDesc: A Chaos Marine Terminator stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Huge describes this man the most. The armor he wears is the biggest you have
ever seen. Huge plates connect to cover his entire body, they must be about
three inches thick.

mobs.LongDesc: A Chaos Dreadnought stands here
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A lone dreadnought, or robot, stands here guarding something, what you do not
know. It seems almost dead as it doesn't move a muscle, or metal arm in this
case.

mobs.LongDesc: Palindor the Unforgiven stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Palindor is more of a walking corpse than a man.  His dead eyes stare
at you with burning hate.  His black robe flows about his body as 
lunges to attack you!  His body oder isn't exactly zestfully clean
either. Ick!

mobs.LongDesc: Katam stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Katam is dressed in robves that have a rotten stench about them. He is tall and
has black matted hair, that falls around his shoulders and across his chest.
His eyes pierce into your soul.

mobs.LongDesc: The Lord of Corruption stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A huge mass of flesh sits here on the ground. It has two arms that seem to just
grow out of the middle of the mass. It's head, if you could call it that, sits
on the top of all the flesh. It's eyes, huge and yellow, seem to tear into
your heart.

mobs.LongDesc: Ragmor the Damned stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Ragmor the Damned stands here eminating huge clouds of death. When hit by a
wave of one such cloud you reel in pain and agony, for that is what Ragmor
strives for. Ragmor sends your stomach reeling and your mind into panic.

mobs.LongDesc: Zeathos the Destroyer stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Zeathos the Destroyer is here seeking blood for his blood god. He looks at you
and charges into battle screaming at the top of his lungs, Blood for the Blood
God!!! He has spittle and foam flowing from his mouth as he cleaves into you.

mobs.LongDesc: A Khorne Champion stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This beast lives for only one reason, and that is to serve his god. And that
god is the mighty Khorne, ruler of all that is war. The beast seems almost
human like, that is if you could call a nine foot tall, horned, minotuar
headed, rat human like.

mobs.LongDesc: A Traitor Terminator stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This terminator is rather normal looking, if you look past the many skulls and
body parts stuck to his armor. He struggles to keep at least some humanity
working for the chaos gods, but after centuries of torment he has finally
failed and been taken over by the gods evil corruption.

mobs.LongDesc: Kelin the Corrupt stands here
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Kelin used to be commander for the Cresant Hawks before the Horus Hersey, but
now he commands the lowly beastmen of the chaos legions. He doesnot like his
job and seems to want to take it out on you.

mobs.LongDesc: A Chaos Magus stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A non-descript magus stands here studying some sort of scroll, when he looks
up. He instantly sends a wave of death rolling forward into your ranks. He
seems to be evilly grinning at you as he points his finger.

mobs.LongDesc: Gorath the Unpure stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Gorath stands here studying what is left of his poor ship.  He used to command
this vessel years ago when it was thought of as a merchant ship, but
now he flys the cosmos to bring other civilizations into the light,
err, darkness of his god.
